title: 1. Pilot
description: A kindergarten teacher collapses. House reluctantly gets involved. Snark level: high.

title: 2. Paternity
description: A teen athlete has night terrors. House questions everything—including paternity.

title: 3. Occam’s Razor
description: A student collapses with bizarre symptoms. House simplifies the chaos—his way.

title: 4. Maternity
description: Newborns fall ill in the maternity ward. House throws out ethics to solve it.

title: 5. Damned If You Do
description: A nun with a rash and visions challenges House’s atheism and diagnostic skills.

title: 6. The Socratic Method
description: A schizophrenic woman might have something worse. House skips protocol, again.

title: 7. Fidelity
description: Married woman, sleeping issues, potential parasite. House implies infidelity. A lot.

title: 8. Poison
description: Teen collapses during a test. House hunts for environmental causes—and sarcasm targets.
